akn:section.akn:heading: Higher grade for service in special positions

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7342. Higher grade for service in special positions Upon retirement, any permanent professor of the United States Military Academy whose grade is below brigadier general, and whose service as such a professor has been long and distinguished, may, in the discretion of the President, be retired in the grade of brigadier general.
